division.explanation: Write the name of the court location (like 'Honolulu' or 'Kauai').

civil_number.explanation: Write the case number. You can find this on other court papers for your case.

plaintiffs.explanation: Write the full name of the person or people who started the case (the one suing).

defendants.explanation: Write the full name of the person or people being sued.

filing_party_or_attorney.explanation: Write your name and contact info (address, phone, etc.). If you have a lawyer, write their name and info too.

documents_served.explanation: Write the name of the document you gave to the other person (like 'Complaint' or 'Motion') and the date you filed it with the court.

service_date.explanation: Write the exact date you gave or mailed the document to the other person.

service_method.explanation: Say how you gave the document to the other person: write 'Hand-delivery' if you gave it in person, or 'Mail' if you sent it by mail.

recipient_names_and_addresses.explanation: Write the full name and mailing address of each person you gave or mailed the document to.

signature.explanation: Sign your name here to say the information is true.

typed_name.explanation: Print or type your full name here.

date_signed.explanation: Write the date you signed this form.
